author: dnash86
body:
This PR includes all the code for the addition of ME0 type global muons. It has been tested with "runTheMatrix.py --job-reports -j 8 -s -l 1306.0,101.0,1003.0,50202.0,9.0,25202.0" in CMSSW_8_0_0_pre6 (with the creation of ME0 type muons off, which is default).  Please check for any changes that need to be made and any additional tests that should be performed.

Thanks a lot.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_0_X #13308 (original by @dnash86).
title: ME0 Tracker muons
